original_title: HNBA shines at SLIM National Sales Awards
original_body_lines: Despite what was considered a challenging year for the entire insurance industry, team HNB Assurance yet again proved its exceptional sales skill and performance, with four members of its team securing wins at the SLIM National Sales Awards 2022.

The awards ceremony, organised by the Sri Lanka Institute of Marketing (SLIM), is regarded as the most anticipated events of the year for the sales fraternity, recognising the efforts and achievements of high-performing individuals in the sales field.

The winners from HNBA included National Sales Manager 2022 Gold Award – Overall Industry Category Thilan Karunathilake, Front Liner 2022 Gold Award – Life Insurance Category Priyanka Kamalani,  Sales Supervisor 2022 Bronze Award – Life Insurance Category S. Kamalini and Front Liner 2022 Bronze Award – Life Insurance Category Buddhika Jayawardena,.
HNBA CEO Lasitha Wimalaratne congratulated the winners for their invaluable contributions in their respective fields amidst challenging market conditions and for bringing honour to HNBA.
“It is their commitment and unwavering passion which has helped them achieve this remarkable feat in the most prestigious Sales Awards Ceremony in the country,” he added.

Head – Sales Training and Development Shiran Fernando said: “The recognition our team from HNBA received at the SLIM National Sales Awards 2022 is a testament to the company’s commitment to nurturing and developing its teams, ensuring that they are equipped with the skills and knowledge necessary to excel in the industry.”
